TextView.android:text:
~Connect dots horizontally or vertically to close a square.
~To link two dots, touch space in between.
~When fourth segment of a 1x1 square is drawn by a player, that square is theirs and will be filled with their color.
~You will alternate turns with your opponent, BUT if a player gains a square, they can continue playing.
~When there are no more dots to connect, the game is over and the player with the most squares wins!
~Each square gained is worth one point.
